languages.text: {n}Механические руки скульптора изучают необработанный камень: железные пальцы со множеством фаланг находятся в постоянном движении. В каменной заготовке уже улавливаются ваши собственные черты — похоже, кто-то успел заказать вам памятник, как только вы ступили на планету. Старик поворачивает к вам испещренное морщинами лицо с кристаллами вместо глаз.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} приш{mf|ел|ла} взглянуть на свою судьбу? Но творение еще не закончено".

traits.locale_text: {n}Механические руки скульптора изучают необработанный камень: железные пальцы со множеством фаланг находятся в постоянном движении. В каменной заготовке уже улавливаются ваши собственные черты — похоже, кто-то успел заказать вам памятник, как только вы ступили на планету. Старик поворачивает к вам испещренное морщинами лицо с кристаллами вместо глаз.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} приш{mf|ел|ла} взглянуть на свою судьбу? Но творение еще не закончено".

{n}Механические руки скульптора изучают необработанный камень: железные пальцы со множеством фаланг находятся в постоянном движении. В каменной заготовке уже улавливаются ваши собственные черты — похоже, кто-то успел заказать вам памятник, как только вы ступили на планету. Старик поворачивает к вам испещренное морщинами лицо с кристаллами вместо глаз.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} приш{mf|ел|ла} взглянуть на свою судьбу? Но творение еще не закончено".

languages.text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical hands crawl over the rough stone, their many-jointed metal fingers remaining in constant motion. Even now, you recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see crystals where his eyes should be.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."
languages.original_text: {n}Механические руки скульптора ползают по необработанному камню словно пауки: железные пальцы со множеством фаланг находятся в постоянном движении. В каменной заготовке уже улавливаются ваши собственные черты — похоже, кто-то успел заказать вам памятник, как только вы ступили на планету. Старик поворачивает к вам испещренное морщинами лицо с кристаллами вместо глаз.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} приш{mf|ел|ла} взглянуть на свою судьбу? Но творение еще не закончено".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical hands crawl along the rough stone, their many-jointed metal fingers remaining constantly in motion. Already you can recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see that it has crystals instead of eyes.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."

{n}The sculptor's mechanical hands crawl along the rough stone, their many-jointed metal fingers remaining constantly in motion. Already you can recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see that it has crystals instead of eyes.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."

{n}The sculptor's mechanical hands crawl over the rough stone, their many-jointed metal fingers remaining in constant motion. Even now, you recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see crystals where its eyes should be.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."

{n}The old sculptor's mechanical hands are wrapped around the statue like metal ivy. His many-jointed fingers chip away at the stone with remarkable grace, shedding glittering dust. His talent is apparent even now, with only the sculpture's outline in place. Through its translucent sapphirion facets, you see a shaven head and a wrinkled face with crystals instead of eyes.{/n} "Is my celestial {mf|lord|lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, it is not yet complete."

Even now, you recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see crystals where his eyes should be.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."

Even now, you recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see crystals where his eyes should be.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."

languages.text: {n}雕刻师两只机械手在粗糙的石头上爬行，满是关节的金属手指一刻不停地活动着。尽管他手中的雕像仅仅是个雏形，但你清楚地认出了你自己的相貌，就仿佛你从踏上这颗行星的那一刻起，就有人委托他雕刻一座你的雕像。老人将布满皱纹的脸转向了你，本该是眼睛的地方赫然是两颗水晶。{/n}“来自上界的大人，是否在凝视着{mf|他|她}自己的命运？遗憾的是，我的造物尚未完成。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical hands crawl over the rough stone, their many-jointed metal fingers remaining in constant motion. Even now, you recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see crystals where his eyes should be.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."

traits.locale_text: {n}雕刻师两只机械手在粗糙的石头上爬行，满是关节的金属手指一刻不停地活动着。尽管他手中的雕像仅仅是个雏形，但你清楚地认出了你自己的相貌，就仿佛你从踏上这颗行星的那一刻起，就有人委托他雕刻一座你的雕像。老人将布满皱纹的脸转向了你，本该是眼睛的地方赫然是两颗水晶。{/n}“来自上界的大人，是否在凝视着{mf|他|她}自己的命运？遗憾的是，我的造物尚未完成。”

languages.text: {n}Las manos mecánicas del escultor recorren la piedra, sin dejar de mover sus articulados dedos metálicos. Reconoces tus rasgos en la obra inacabada: alguien encargó una estatua tuya en cuanto pusiste pie en el planeta. El anciano se gira hacia ti y ves que unos cristales ocupan el lugar donde normalmente tendría los ojos.{/n} «¿Viene mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial a contemplar su destino? Lo lamento, pero mi obra no está completa aún».
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical hands crawl over the rough stone, their many-jointed metal fingers remaining in constant motion. Even now, you recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see crystals where his eyes should be.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."

Reconoces tus rasgos en la obra inacabada: alguien encargó una estatua tuya en cuanto pusiste pie en el planeta. El anciano se gira hacia ti y ves que unos cristales ocupan el lugar donde normalmente tendría los ojos.{/n} «¿Viene mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial a contemplar su destino? Lo lamento, pero mi obra no está completa aún».

languages.text: {n}Mekanik ellerini pürüzlü taşa değdiren heykeltıraşın çok eklemli metal parmakları sürekli hareket ediyor. Hatta bitmemiş olan eserde, sanki gezegene ayak bastığında anda biri heykelini sipariş etmiş gibi kendini görüyorsun. Yaşlı adam, kırışıklıklarla dolu suratını sana çevirdiğinde gözleri olması gereken yerde kristaller olduğunu fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} kaderine bakmaya mı geldi? Maalesef yaratımım henüz tamamlanmış değil."
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical hands crawl over the rough stone, their many-jointed metal fingers remaining in constant motion. Even now, you recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see crystals where his eyes should be.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mekanik ellerini pürüzlü taşa değdiren heykeltıraşın çok eklemli metal parmakları sürekli hareket ediyor. Hatta bitmemiş olan eserde, sanki gezegene ayak bastığında anda biri heykelini sipariş etmiş gibi kendini görüyorsun. Yaşlı adam, kırışıklıklarla dolu suratını sana çevirdiğinde gözleri olması gereken yerde kristaller olduğunu fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} kaderine bakmaya mı geldi? Maalesef yaratımım henüz tamamlanmış değil."

languages.text: {n}彫刻家の機械の手が荒削りの石の上を這った。関節の多い金属の指は絶えず動き続けている。未完成の像にはすでに自分の顔立ちが見て取れた。どうやらこの惑星に降り立った瞬間から、誰かがあなたの像を依頼していたようだ。老人はしわだらけの顔をあなたに向けた。その目には本来あるべきものの代わりにクリスタルが埋め込まれていることに気づいた。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}よ、ご自身の運命を見に来られたんですか？あいにく、わしの創作はまだ完成しておりません」
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical hands crawl over the rough stone, their many-jointed metal fingers remaining in constant motion. Even now, you recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see crystals where his eyes should be.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."

traits.locale_text: {n}彫刻家の機械の手が荒削りの石の上を這った。関節の多い金属の指は絶えず動き続けている。未完成の像にはすでに自分の顔立ちが見て取れた。どうやらこの惑星に降り立った瞬間から、誰かがあなたの像を依頼していたようだ。老人はしわだらけの顔をあなたに向けた。その目には本来あるべきものの代わりにクリスタルが埋め込まれていることに気づいた。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}よ、ご自身の運命を見に来られたんですか？あいにく、わしの創作はまだ完成しておりません」

languages.text: {n}Les mains mécaniques du sculpteur parcourent la roche brute, ses doigts métalliques aux nombreuses jointures constamment en mouvement. L'œuvre est loin d'être achevée, mais vous y reconnaissez vos traits. Il semblerait que quelqu'un a commandé un portrait de vous dès l'instant où vous avez posé pied sur cette planète. Le vieil homme se tourne vers vous, et vous constatez que ses yeux ont été remplacés par deux cristaux.{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie est-elle venue contempler sa destinée ? Hélas ! Ma création n'est pas encore terminée. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical hands crawl over the rough stone, their many-jointed metal fingers remaining in constant motion. Even now, you recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see crystals where his eyes should be.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."

L'œuvre est loin d'être achevée, mais vous y reconnaissez vos traits. Il semblerait que quelqu'un a commandé un portrait de vous dès l'instant où vous avez posé pied sur cette planète. Le vieil homme se tourne vers vous, et vous constatez que ses yeux ont été remplacés par deux cristaux.{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie est-elle venue contempler sa destinée ? Hélas ! Ma création n'est pas encore terminée. »

languages.text: {n}Die mechanische Hand des Skulpteurs fliegt über den unbehauenen Stein und ihre vielgliedrigen Finger sind in ständiger Bewegung. Schon jetzt erkennst du deine Gesichtszüge in dem unvollendeten Werk ... jemand scheint in dem Moment eine Statue von dir in Auftrag gegeben zu haben, als du den Planeten betreten hast. Als dir der alte Mann sein faltiges Gesicht zuwendet, erkennst du, dass Kristalle seine Augen ersetzen.{/n} "Ist {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin} hier, um {mf|sein|ihr} Schicksal zu bestaunen? Leider ist mein Werk noch nicht fertig."
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's mechanical hands crawl over the rough stone, their many-jointed metal fingers remaining in constant motion. Even now, you recognise your own features in the unfinished piece — it seems someone commissioned a statue of you the moment you set foot on the planet. The old man turns his wrinkled face to you, and you see crystals where his eyes should be.{/n} "Is my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} here to gaze upon {mf|his|her} destiny? Alas, my creation is not yet complete."
